column2: 1347 Property Insurance Holdings, Inc. engages in the provision of personal property insurance in coastal markets including those in Louisiana, Texas and Florida. The company is headquartered in St. Petersburg, Florida and currently employs 14 full-time employees. The Company, through its subsidiaries, is engaged in reinsurance and investment management businesses. The firm offers wind/hail insurance, manufactured home insurance and dwelling fire insurance. The company writes both full peril property policies, as well as wind/hail only exposures and it distributes policies through independent insurance agents. Its wind/hail insurance policy is written on an owner or non-owner occupied dwelling, which protects from the perils of wind and/or hail-only weather events. Its manufactured home insurance policy is written on a manufactured or mobile home. The policy can provide for coverage on the manufactured home, the insured's personal property in the home and liability, and medical payments can be included. Its dwelling fire policy can be issued on an owner occupied or non-owner (tenant) occupied dwelling property.
